verses.verse: It is a good <S%H2896><s%> thing to give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> to sing praises <S%H2167><s%> to your name, <S%H8034><s%> Most High; <S%H5945><s%>
to proclaim <S%H5046><s%> your loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and your faithfulness <S%H530><s%> every night, <S%H3915><s%>
with the ten-stringed <S%H6218><s%> lute, <S%H5035><s%> with the harp, and with the melody <S%H1902><s%> of the lyre. <S%H3658><s%>
For you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, have made me glad <S%H8055><s%> through your work. <S%H6467><s%> I will triumph <S%H7442><s%> in the works <S%H4639><s%> of your hands. <S%H3027><s%>
How great <S%H1431><s%> are your works, <S%H4639><s%> Yahweh! <S%H3068><s%> Your thoughts <S%H4284><s%> are very <S%H3966><s%> deep. <S%H6009><s%>
A senseless <S%H1198><s%> man <S%H376><s%> doesn't <S%H3045><s%> know, neither does a fool <S%H3684><s%> understand this: <S%H995><s%>

though the wicked <S%H7563><s%> spring <S%H6524><s%> up as the grass, <S%H6212><s%> and all the evildoers <S%H205><s%> <S%H6466><s%> flourish, <S%H6692><s%> they will be destroyed <S%H8045><s%> forever. <S%H5703><s%>
But you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, are on high <S%H4791><s%> forevermore. <S%H5769><s%>

For, <S%H341><s%> behold, your enemies, Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> for, <S%H341><s%> behold, your enemies shall perish. <S%H6><s%> All the evildoers <S%H205><s%> <S%H6466><s%> will be scattered. <S%H6504><s%>
But you have exalted my horn <S%H7161><s%> like that of the wild ox. <S%H7214><s%> I am anointed <S%H1101><s%> with fresh <S%H7488><s%> oil. <S%H8081><s%>
My eye <S%H5869><s%> has also seen <S%H5027><s%> my enemies. <S%H7790><s%> My ears <S%H241><s%> have heard <S%H8085><s%> of the wicked <S%H7489><s%> enemies who rise up against me. <S%H6965><s%>
The righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall flourish <S%H6524><s%> like the palm tree. <S%H8558><s%> He will grow <S%H7685><s%> like a cedar <S%H730><s%> in Lebanon. <S%H3844><s%>
They are planted <S%H8362><s%> in Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s house. <S%H1004><s%> They will flourish <S%H6524><s%> in our God <S%H430><s%>'s courts. <S%H2691><s%>
They will still bring forth fruit <S%H5107><s%> in old age. <S%H7872><s%> They will be full of sap <S%H1879><s%> and green, <S%H7488><s%>
to show <S%H5046><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is upright. <S%H3477><s%> He is my rock, <S%H6697><s%> and there is no unrighteousness in him. <S%H5766><s%>
